title: Ohmium opens Rs 2,000 crore green hydrogen electrolyzer gigafactory near Bengaluru
description: Ohmium's Rs 2000 crore green hydrogen electrolyzer plant in Bengaluru backs PM Modi’s green goals. Its 500 MW capacity will scale to 2,000 MW, generating jobs and using water electrolysis for green hydrogen. This industry-agnostic, pollution-free fuel, endorsed by Tata Group and NTPC, supports renewable energy, EV priorities, and India’s 5 trillion-dollar economy aim.
